long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension enhances your Bubble.io editor and improves the UI. It's free to use and maintained by the Bubble community at Codeless Love!

Features include:
 * Multiline/indented expression editor.
 * Easy-select text values
 * Bad practice hi lighter
 * Workflow folder and flow differentiator
 * Widening OS inputs when possible
 * Preserving spacing of "move up" and "move down" link on the OS page.
 * Left-align the composer, leaving room on the right for property editors. 
* Row hover effect on style fonts and colors.
